head.supplied: Treasury, Melbourne, ¶ 15th November, 1869 ¶ No. 6394 ¶ Sir, ¶ ¶ I am directed by the Honorable the Treasurer to forward to you the accompanying form, ¶ on which to render certain information which ...

div.p: 69/R8734, unit 486, VPRS 1207/P000 inward registered correspondence, VA 865 Department of the Treasurer, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p: The letter is a printed circular signed by Symonds with the number and addressee entered by hand. Treasury, Melbourne,

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
I am directed by the Honorable the Treasurer to forward to you the accompanying form,
The form that accompanied the letter was signed and returned by M, once it had been completed; see M to R. Byrne, 15 November 1869 (in this edition as 69-11-15b). on which to render certain information which he desires to possess respecting the Expenditure and Liabilities of the Year 1868: and I am to request that you will be good enough to cause the form to be filled in as indicated by it, and returned to the Treasury not later than Wednesday forenoon.
It is further requested that, in the event of there being further Supplementary Estimates (1868), the total amount thereof may be stated in the columns of remarks.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be
